name: Race Fighter
description:
A racing game where enemies try to kill you along the way.

Move using W, aim using the mouse.

When you finish a lap you get an upgrade, get points by completing laps and killing enemies. But be carfeull because enemies get tougher over time!

My highscores are: 

level 1: 2200

level2 : 730

level3: 880

Tips:

-Try upgrading speed at the start od the run to get more upgrades, and get damage upgrades later on

-you can let go of W to keep going in one direction while shooting in another direction
